title: Easy Time Clock
description:
It's as Easy as 1-2-3!
	
				Step 1
		EMPLOYEES CLOCK IN
			with a computer, mobile device, or reader.		
				Step 2
		GENERATE REPORTS
			to view totals, make edits, and digitally approve for payroll.		
				Step 3
		EXPORT PAYROLL
			and relax - you're done. Congratulations! You did it.		

		Fabulou
